hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go, I’ll suffer humiliation at the hands of the duke.
second_translate: If I let you go like this, I'll suffer humiliation at the hands of the duke.
Hey, boss.
These guys...
Should I castrate them?
Hmm...
No, that's a bit much.
Thank you, my lady.
We will never act recklessly again.

first_translate: we’re so glad you forgave us...
second_translate: It’s such a relief that you forgave us...
Who said I forgave you?
Aaaah!

first_translate: my lady, you should close your eyes.
second_translate: My lady, it would be best if you closed your eyes.
I'll cover your ears for you.
Huh?
Okay...
There, all done.

hangle: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
first_translate: don’t cut them off. just give them each a good whack.
second_translate: Don't cut them off. Just give each of them a good, hard beating.
Sure.
Ugh...
And before that,

first_translate: take a good look at my face.
second_translate: Take a good look at my face.

hangle: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
first_translate: you should remember who not to bite when you’re carrying out a job.
second_translate: You should remember who you must never bite when carrying out a job.
Yes...
I'm sorry...

first_translate: do you think you can remember?
second_translate: Do you think you can forget?
I think that’s enough of a lecture.
Now...
It's time for the punishment!
Aaaah!!
Next.
Kegh!!
Is this place...

first_translate: ...the place that was swallowed by darkness?
second_translate: Is this a place swallowed by darkness?

first_translate: we can’t even recover the bodies...
second_translate: We can't even retrieve the bodies...

first_translate: your highness, what will you do now?
second_translate: Your Highness, what do you plan to do next?

first_translate: we’ll use this as a base...
second_translate: We’ll establish this as our base...

first_translate: ...and start hunting the monsters in the forest.
second_translate: ...and begin a full-scale hunt for the monsters in the forest.

hangle: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
first_translate: wouldn’t it be better for lady fiona to stay with the academy researchers?
second_translate: Wouldn't it be better for Lady Fiona to stay with the academy researchers?

first_translate: they seem to have a lot of work to do.
second_translate: There seems to be quite a lot of work to do.
Hm...

first_translate: he doesn’t want to send me somewhere dangerous, huh?
second_translate: So, he doesn't want to send me somewhere dangerous, huh?
your highness,

first_translate: we should keep our personal and public lives separate.
second_translate: We should distinguish between personal matters and official duties.
This isn't where I should be.
You know, don't you?
Blushing...
The beauty trap worked.

hangle: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
first_translate: let’s work hard since we’ve received an imperial edict from his majesty.
second_translate: For now, I’ll work hard since I’ve also received an imperial edict from His Majesty.

first_translate: just go out for a little while at the beginning.
second_translate: Just step out briefly at the start.
Wow.

hangle: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
first_translate: abel needs to hurry back so he can take your place.
second_translate: …Abel needs to hurry back so he can take over for you.

first_translate: you’re just trying to make your master do all the work.
second_translate: You're just thinking about making your master do all the work.
You two are still close.
…From what angle does it look that way?

hangle: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
first_translate: oh my, you’re as close as you were when you were young.
second_translate: Oh my, no matter how you look at it, you're just as close as you were in your childhood.

hangle: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
first_translate: you’ve both grown rapidly like bean sprouts, though.
second_translate: You've both shot up like bean sprouts, though.
Oh.
Sir, you dropped this.
Oh, thank you.
Is this yours, Sir?

first_translate: yes. would you like to see?
second_translate: Yes. Would you like to take a look?

first_translate: it’s my wife, who I left at home.
second_translate: She's my wife, whom I left at home.

first_translate: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
second_translate: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
Wah!

first_translate: you should have told me that!
second_translate: You should've told me that sooner!

hangle: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
first_translate: you should be with your wife, not me!
second_translate: You should be by your wife's side, not mine!

first_translate: I have no choice. it’s my duty.
second_translate: I have no choice. It's my mission.

hangle: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
first_translate: still, my master said he’d let me go back before the due date.
second_translate: Still, my lord said he’d allow me to return before the due date.

hangle: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
first_translate: abel, you’re too harsh when it comes to making people work!
second_translate: Abel, you're too ruthless when it comes to making people work!
All right.

hangle: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
first_translate: I’ll help you get back to hylon even faster.
second_translate: I'll make sure you can return to Hylon even sooner.
Thank you!
You know,

first_translate: I know you have a reason to be in a hurry,
second_translate: I know you have a reason to rush,

hangle: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
first_translate: but if you shoot lightning in the forest, you’ll scare your allies.
second_translate: If you recklessly fire lightning in the forest, you'll end up scaring your allies.
Ahaha...

first_translate: still, it helped us finish early.
second_translate: Still, thanks to that, we finished early.
Oh.
Lady Eunice!
Lady Fiona!

hangle: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
first_translate: do you think you can restore this dead land with your power?
second_translate: Do you think you can restore this dead land with your power, my lady?

first_translate: I think I can do some of it,
second_translate: Some of it might be possible,

hangle: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
first_translate: but I’ve never seen such a large area of dead land before...
second_translate: But this is my first time seeing such a vast expanse of dead land...

first_translate: it’s because I’m not strong enough.
second_translate: It's because my power is insufficient.
My lady...
That's not true.

hangle: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
first_translate: there’s only one saint, but there are many dead lands...
second_translate: There is only one saint, but many dead lands...

first_translate: it’s too much for you to handle on your own.
second_translate: It's unreasonable to bear this burden alone from the start.

hangle: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
first_translate: that’s right. it’s not because you’re not strong enough.
second_translate: That's right, Lady Eunice. You're not the problem.

first_translate: don’t be impatient. take your time.
second_translate: Don't rush. Take it step by step.

first_translate: yes, we’ll help you in any way we can.
second_translate: Yes, we'll help in any way we can.

hangle: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
first_translate: don’t suffer alone if there’s something difficult, my lady.
second_translate: Don't bear the burden alone if something is difficult, my lady.
Everyone...
Everyone is cheering me on like this,

hangle: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
second_translate: I can't be the only one to complain.
I'm sorry for making you worry.
I'll do my best...!
Wow, such great energy.

hangle: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
first_translate: we might finish too quickly at this rate.
second_translate: At this rate, we might end up finishing too soon.
W-Well, that's...
I'm just joking.
